snippet: Uber said it had lowered prices for a service known as uberX — a hodgepodge fleet of unglamorous sedans, minivans and other vehicles — by 20 percent, making it less expensive than the typical yellow taxi ride, according to the company.
abstract: App-based transportation company Uber announces that it has lowered prices for service known as uberX, hodgepodge fleet of unglamorous vehicles, by 20 percent; move, which makes uberX trip less expensive than a typical New York city yellow taxi ride, is among company's most brazen maneuvers yet to upend yellow cab industry.
lead_paragraph: Uber said it had lowered prices for a service known as uberX — a hodgepodge fleet of unglamorous sedans, minivans and other vehicles — by 20 percent, making it less expensive than the typical yellow taxi ride, according to the company.

headline.main: A Taxi Alternative, UberX, Offers Lower Fares
headline.print_headline: A Taxi Alternative, UberX, Offers Lower Fares
